page.title: 01Bt. Hereford & Moreton on Lu
page.content: The area between Hereford and Morton on Lugg is predominantly rural, containing several farms, but there are areas of housing in square 3 (Moreton on Lugg) and square 7. There is also an industrial estate in Moreton on Lugg (square 4). Most of the amenities in the block are situated in square 3, Moreton on Lugg. They are:-a primary school village stores petrol filling station a church There are two other churches, at Portway, and Pipe and Lyde. There is also a garage with servicing at Pipe and Lyde. The area is very near the city of Hereford, with its many facilities. The land is mostly cultivated, with a little pastureland, and some rough grazing in half of the squares.
